alert.note: Alert for Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 7:18PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong winds associated with developing thinderstorms will impact portions of eastern Elbert and central Lincoln Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 717 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking developing thunderstorms 8 miles south of Agate, or 12 miles northwest of Limon, moving southeast at 35 mph and producing strong outflow winds. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Limon, Hugo, Genoa, Agate, Punkin Center and Matheson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County
